translated: If one does not practice in terms of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, or the wishless gate of liberation as permanent or impermanent, one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya ba'am /
translated: If one were to ask whether the dhāraṇī gateways are permanent,🔽

analyzed: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya ba'am /
translated: If they do not engage with the notion that the dhāraṇī gateways are permanent, or that they are impermanent, they practice the perfection of wisdom.

translated: If they do not engage with the notion that the dhāraṇī gateways are a self, or that they are not a self, they practice the perfection of wisdom.

translated: “If they do not engage with the ten powers of the tathāgatas, they are practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bde zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bde zhes bya ba'am /
translated: If they do not engage with the ten powers of the tathāgatas in terms of their being permanent or impermanent, they are practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag ces bya ba'am /🔽bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag ces bya ba'am / bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If they do not engage with the ten powers of the tathāgatas in terms of their being imbued with happiness or suffering, they are practicing the perfection of wisdom.🔽If they do not engage with the ten powers of the tathāgatas in terms of their being a self or not a self, they are practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sdug ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sdug ces bya ba'am /
translated: If they do not engage with the ten powers of the tathāgatas in terms of their being attractive or unattractive, they are practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the powers are unattractive, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am /
analyzed: gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am /
translated: Because the powers of the tathāgatas are not such that they can be made permanent or impermanent,

analyzed: bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am /

analyzed: bdag gam bdag med pa'am /

analyzed: @302b gal te mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // gal te mi 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am /
translated: “If one does not engage with the notion that the fearlessnesses are permanent, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽gal te mi 'jigs pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // gal te mi 'jigs pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am /
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the fearlessnesses are impermanent, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the fearlessnesses are happy, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽gal te mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽gal te mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag ces bya ba'am /
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the fearlessnesses are suffering, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the fearlessnesses are a self, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽gal te mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // gal te mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am /
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the powers are with attachment or that they are without attachment, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the fearlessnesses are with aversion or that they are without aversion, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the fearlessnesses are with attachment or that they are without attachment, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the fearlessnesses are with anger or that they are without anger, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the fearlessnesses are with delusion or that they are without delusion, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the fearlessnesses are with defilement or that they are without defilement, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the fearlessnesses are with purification or that they are without purification, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the fearlessnesses are with increase or that they are with decrease, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am /
analyzed: gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am /
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the fearlessnesses are with arising or that they are with cessation, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am /🔽bdag gam bdag med pa'am /🔽sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mi 'jigs pa rnams med do //
analyzed: bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am / bdag gam bdag med pa'am / sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mi 'jigs pa rnams med do //
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the fearlessnesses are with defilement or that they are with purification, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the fearlessnesses are with increase or that they are with decrease, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am /
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the fearlessnesses are with arising or that they are with cessation, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the fearlessnesses are with the worldly or that they are with the supramundane, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the fearlessnesses are with conditioned phenomena or that they are with unconditioned phenomena, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am /
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the fearlessnesses are with the past, future, or present, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion

original: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bya ba'am /
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the powers are suffering, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the powers are a self, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha @303a *//🔽rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha @303a *// rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am /
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the powers are not a self, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the powers are empty, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the powers are not empty, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the powers are with signs, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the powers are signless, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the powers are with aspirations, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the powers are without aspirations, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the powers are calm, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the powers are not calm, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the powers are void, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am /
analyzed: gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am /
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the powers are not void, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am /
analyzed: bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am /
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the powers are afflicted, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the powers are purified, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the powers are origination, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the powers are cessation, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: bdag gam bdag med pa'am / sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med do //
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the powers are emptiness, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the powers are signlessness, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te byams pa chen po la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: gal te byams pa chen po la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the powers are aspirationlessness, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: gal te byams pa chen po rtag ces bya ba'am /

translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

analyzed: gal te gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: if they do not engage with ‘form is incomplete,’ they engage in the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

analyzed: gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no //
translated: Whatever is incomplete form is not form.

analyzed: zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not practice in that way, one practices the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: gal te tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not practice thinking, ‘Feeling is not complete,’ one practices the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not practice thinking, ‘That which is not complete is not feeling,’ one practices the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te 'du shes yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: gal te 'du shes yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not practice thinking, ‘Perception is not complete,’ one practices the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?🔽If one does not practice thinking, ‘That which is not complete is not perception,’ one practices the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'du shes yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'du shes ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar @305b yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: 'du shes yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'du shes ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar @305b yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not practice thinking, ‘Volition is not complete,’ one practices the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te 'du byed yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: gal te 'du byed yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not practice with the idea that the formative forces are not fully enlightened, one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'du byed yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: 'du byed yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not practice with the idea that the formative forces which are not fully enlightened are not the formative forces, one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: gal te rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not practice with the idea that consciousness is not fully enlightened, one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhe bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //

translated: And why?🔽If one does not practice with the idea that the consciousness which is not fully enlightened is not consciousness, one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te mig yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: gal te mig yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not practice with the idea that the eye is not fully enlightened, one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,🔽it is because an eye that is not complete is not an eye.

analyzed: mig yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de mig ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the ears are not complete, one engages in the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te rna ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: gal te rna ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the ears are not complete, one engages in the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

translated: Because the incompleteness of the feeling that arises from the union of nose, smell, and the consciousness of smell is not the feeling that arises from the union of nose, smell, and the consciousness of smell.

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / skye mched drug yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de skye mched drug ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do; ;gal te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi
translated: And why?🔽If one does not engage in such practices as, ‘The non-completion of the six sense fields is not the six sense fields,’ then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.

translated: If one does not engage in such practices as, ‘Contact is not completed,’ then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.

translated: If one does not practice in that way, ‘contact is not fully completed,’ then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not practice in that way, ‘feeling is not fully completed,’ then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not practice in that way, ‘craving is not fully completed,’ then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gal te tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If one does not practice in that way, ‘grasping is not fully completed,’ then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not practice in that way, ‘existence is not fully completed,’ then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not practice in that way, ‘birth is not fully completed,’ then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not practice in that way, ‘aging and death is not fully completed,’ then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not practice in that way, ‘sorrow, lamentation, pain, despair, and distress are not fully completed,’ then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not practice in that way, ‘the perfection of giving is not fully completed,’ then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not practice in that way, ‘the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom are not fully completed,’ then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not practice in that way, ‘the emptiness of internal phenomena is not fully completed,’ then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not practice in that way, ‘the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities are not fully completed,’ then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not practice in that way, ‘the applications of mindfulness are not fully completed,’ then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?🔽Because that which is incomplete is not the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.🔽If one does not practice, thinking, ‘The emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is incomplete,’ then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.🔽And why?🔽Because that which is incomplete is not the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

analyzed: de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //

translated: And why?🔽Because that which is incomplete is not the emptiness of the uncompounded.

original: gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not engage in the idea that the emptiness of what transcends limits is incomplete, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: Because that which is incomplete is not the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: gal te thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: gal te thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not engage in the idea that the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is incomplete, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?🔽Because that which is incomplete in the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is not the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
translated: If one does not engage in that idea, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: do // gal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @313b la spyod do //
analyzed: do // gal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @313b la spyod do //
translated: If one does not engage in the idea that the emptiness of non-rejection is incomplete, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not practice thinking, ‘The emptiness of nonrejection is incomplete,’ then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not practice thinking, ‘The emptiness of nature is incomplete,’ then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //

translated: If one does not practice thinking, ‘The emptiness of nature that is incomplete is not the emptiness of nature,’ then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not practice thinking, ‘The emptiness of all phenomena is incomplete,’ then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //

translated: If one does not engage in such a way that the emptiness of all phenomena is not complete, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not engage in such a way that the emptiness of defining characteristics is not complete, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: la spyod do //
analyzed: la spyod do //
translated: If one does not engage in such a way that the emptiness of nonapprehension is not complete, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,🔽Su­bhūti, it is because that which is incomplete is not the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //

translated: If you ask why,

translated: If one does not practice thinking, ‘The emptiness of essential nature is incomplete,’ then one practices the perfection of wisdom.

translated: If one does not practice thinking, ‘The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things that is incomplete is not the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things,’ then one practices the perfection of wisdom.

translated: If they do not engage with that notion, then they practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /

translated: If they do not engage with the notion that ‘the four assurances are incomplete,’ then they practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar @317a *//
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar @317a *//
translated: If you ask why, it is because that which is incomplete with regard to the four assurances is not the four assurances.

original: yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If they do not engage with that notion, then they practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: gal te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not engage in the idea that the four correct knowledges are incomplete, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not engage in the idea that the correct knowledges that are incomplete are not the correct knowledges, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te byams pa chen po yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: gal te byams pa chen po yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not engage in the idea that great love is incomplete, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: byams pa chen po yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de byams pa chen po ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: byams pa chen po yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de byams pa chen po ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not engage in the idea that great love that is incomplete is not great love, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: gal te snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not practice, thinking, ‘Great compassion is not perfected,’ one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de snying rje chen po ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de snying rje chen po ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not practice, thinking, ‘That which is not perfected is not great compassion,’ one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not practice, thinking, ‘The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not perfected,’ one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang @317b yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang @317b yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not practice, thinking, ‘That which is not perfected is not the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,’ one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: gal te thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not practice by way of ‘the knowledge of all aspects is not complete’, then one practices the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not practice by way of ‘that which is not the knowledge of all aspects is the knowledge of all aspects’, then one practices the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not practice by way of ‘the knowledge of the aspects of the path is not complete’, then one practices the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //

translated: If one does not practice by way of ‘that which is not the knowledge of the aspects of the path is the knowledge of the aspects of the path’, then one practices the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /

translated: If one does not practice in terms of ‘the knowledge of all aspects is not complete,’ then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom. And why?

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not practice in terms of ‘that which is not the knowledge of all aspects is the knowledge of all aspects,’ then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.🔽Subhūti said,

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa // rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //

analyzed: de de bzhin te /

translated: The Tathāgata, the Arhat, the perfectly enlightened Buddha has taught well the attachment and non-attachment of sons of noble family and daughters of noble family in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas.

analyzed: 'du shes chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //

analyzed: 'du byed chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //

analyzed: rnam par shes pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //

analyzed: mig chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //

analyzed: lce chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //

analyzed: lus chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //

analyzed: yid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //

analyzed: gzugs chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //

analyzed: sgra chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //

analyzed: reg chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //

analyzed: chos chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They have no notion of dharmas as something to be attached to or not to be attached to.

analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //

analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //

analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //

translated: They have no notion that the composite of thought contact is attached or not attached.🔽They have no notion that the sensation that arises from the composite of eye contact is attached or not attached.🔽They have no notion that the sensation that arises from the composite of ear contact is attached or not attached.

analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar @326b 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They have no notion that the sensation that arises from the composite of nose contact is attached or not attached.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: He has no notion of the feelings that arise from the contact of the tongue and tastes as being connected or disconnected.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: He has no notion of the feelings that arise from the contact of the body and touchables as being connected or disconnected.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //

analyzed: sa'i khams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //

analyzed: chu'i khams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: He has no notion of the water element as being connected or disconnected.

analyzed: me'i khams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do // rlung gi khams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //

original: nam mkha'i khams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //

analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: There is no perception of the consciousness element as attached or unattached.

original: ma rig pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: ma rig pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: There is no perception of ignorance as attached or unattached.

original: 'du byed chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: 'du byed chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: There is no perception of volitional factors as attached or unattached.

original: rnam par shes pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: There is no perception of consciousness as attached or unattached.

original: ming dang gzugs chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: There is no perception of name and form as attached or unattached.

original: skye mched drug chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //🔽reg pa chags pa'am ma @327a *//
analyzed: skye mched drug chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do // reg pa chags pa'am ma @327a *//
translated: There is no perception of the six sense spheres as attached or unattached.

original: chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: There is no perception of contact as attached or unattached.

original: tshor ba chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: tshor ba chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: There is no perception of feeling as attached or unattached.

original: sred pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: sred pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: There is no perception of craving as attached or unattached.

original: len pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: len pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the notion that grasping is attached or not attached.🔽They do not have the notion that becoming is attached or not attached.

original: srid pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do; ;skye ba chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: srid pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do; ;skye ba chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the notion that birth is attached or not attached.

original: rga shi chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: rga shi chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the notion that old age and death is attached or not attached.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the notion that the perfection of giving is attached or not attached.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the notion that the perfection of morality is attached or not attached.🔽They do not have the notion that the perfection of patience is attached or not attached.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the notion that the perfection of perseverance is attached or not attached.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They have no notion that the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is something to which one can become attached or to which one cannot become attached.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They have no notion that the transcendent perfection of wisdom is something to which one can become attached or to which one cannot become attached.

original: nang stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They have no notion that inner emptiness is something to which one can become attached or to which one cannot become attached.

original: phyi stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They have no notion that outer emptiness is something to which one can become attached or to which one cannot become attached.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid chags @327b pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid chags @327b pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They have no notion that inner and outer emptiness is something to which one can become attached or to which one cannot become attached.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They have no notion that the emptiness of emptiness is something to which one can become attached or to which one cannot become attached.

original: chen po stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They have no notion that great emptiness is something to which one can become attached or to which one cannot become attached.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They have no notion that ultimate emptiness is something to which one can become attached or to which one cannot become attached.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the idea that conditioned emptiness is attached or not attached.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the idea that unconditioned emptiness is attached or not attached.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the idea that emptiness of what is beyond limits is attached or not attached.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the idea that emptiness of no beginning and no end is attached or not attached.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the idea that emptiness of what is not to be discarded is attached or not attached.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the idea that emptiness of inherent existence is attached or not attached.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the idea that emptiness of all things is attached or not attached.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the emptiness of defining attributes as being connected or disconnected.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the emptiness of non-apprehension as being connected or disconnected.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags @328a *//
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags @328a *//
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the emptiness of non-dispersal as being connected or disconnected.

original: pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the emptiness of inherent existence as being connected or disconnected.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the emptiness of all things as being connected or disconnected.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the emptiness of inherent identity as being connected or disconnected.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the emptiness of all things as being connected or disconnected.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do; ;dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do; ;dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the applications of mindfulness as being connected or disconnected.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the right efforts as being connected or disconnected.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //🔽dbang po rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do // dbang po rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not form mental constructs about the bases of supernatural powers as being with attachment or without attachment.🔽They do not form mental constructs about the faculties as being with attachment or without attachment.

original: stobs rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: stobs rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not form mental constructs about the powers as being with attachment or without attachment.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not form mental constructs about the branches of awakening as being with attachment or without attachment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not form mental constructs about the noble eightfold path as being with attachment or without attachment.🔽They do not form mental constructs about the truths as being with attachment or without attachment.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do; ;bsam gtan rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do; ;bsam gtan rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not form mental constructs about the meditative stabilities as being with attachment or without attachment.

original: tshad med pa rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not form mental constructs about the immeasurable aspirations as being with attachment or without attachment.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the notion that the formless absorptions are with attachment or are without attachment.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes @328b pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes @328b pa med do //
translated: They do not have the notion that the eight deliverances are with attachment or are without attachment.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the notion that the nine serial absorptions are with attachment or are without attachment.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the notion that the emptiness meditative stabilization, the signless meditative stabilization, and the wishless meditative stabilization are with attachment or are without attachment.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the notion that the clairvoyances are with attachment or are without attachment.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the notion that the meditative stabilizations are with attachment or are without attachment.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the notion that the dhāraṇī gateways are with attachment or are without attachment.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have any concept of the ten powers of the tathāgatas as being attached or not attached.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have any concept of the four fearlessnesses as being attached or not attached.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //🔽byams pa chen po chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do // byams pa chen po chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have any concept of the four detailed and thorough knowledges as being attached or not attached.🔽They do not have any concept of great love as being attached or not attached.

original: snying rje chen po chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have any concept of great compassion as being attached or not attached.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have any concept of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha as being attached or not attached.🔽They do not have any concept of the result of stream enterer as being attached or not attached.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa @329a *//
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa @329a *//
translated: They do not have any concept of the result of once-returner as being attached or not attached.

original: med do // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: med do // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: “There is no perception of the fruit of non-returning as connected or disconnected.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: “There is no perception of the state of a worthy one as connected or disconnected.

original: rang byang chub chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: rang byang chub chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: “There is no perception of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening as connected or disconnected.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: “There is no perception of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening as connected or disconnected.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said, “Lord,

original: de ltar chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib /
analyzed: de ltar chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib /
translated: it is amazing that this profound Dharma is not diminished when taught

original: ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib /
analyzed: ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib /
translated: and is not diminished when not taught,

original: bstan kyang mi 'phel /
analyzed: bstan kyang mi 'phel /
translated: that it is not increased when taught

original: ma bstan kyang mi 'phel ba ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: ma bstan kyang mi 'phel ba ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: and is not increased when not taught.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽de de bzhin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / de de bzhin no //
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin te /
translated: “Exactly so, Subhūti, exactly so!

original: chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib /
analyzed: chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib /
translated: This profound Dharma is not diminished when taught

original: ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib /
analyzed: ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib /
translated: and is not diminished when not taught,🔽and

original: bstan kyang mi 'phel /
analyzed: bstan kyang mi 'phel /
translated: It does not increase if it is taught.

original: ma bstan kyang mi 'phel lo //
analyzed: ma bstan kyang mi 'phel lo //
translated: It does not increase if it is not taught.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shing nam mkha'i legs pa'am ma legs pa brjod kyang /
analyzed: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shing nam mkha'i legs pa'am ma legs pa brjod kyang /
translated: For example, even if the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One were to remain for the duration of the eon and speak of the good or bad qualities of space,

original: nam mkha' ni legs pa brjod pas yongs su 'grib pa med do //
analyzed: nam mkha' ni legs pa brjod pas yongs su 'grib pa med do //
translated: space would not decrease due to the expression of good qualities.

original: nyes pa brjod kyang yongs su 'grib pa med do //
analyzed: nyes pa brjod kyang yongs su 'grib pa med do //
translated: It would not decrease due to the expression of faults.

original: nam mkha' ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do //
analyzed: nam mkha' ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do //
translated: Space would not increase due to the expression of good qualities.

original: nyes pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do //
analyzed: nyes pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do //
translated: It would not increase due to the expression of faults.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: @329b dper na /
analyzed: @329b dper na /
translated: For example,

original: sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do //
translated: an illusory person would not increase due to the expression of good qualities.

original: nyes pa brjod kyang yongs su 'grib pa med do //
analyzed: nyes pa brjod kyang yongs su 'grib pa med do //
translated: It would not decrease due to the expression of faults.

original: legs pa brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: legs pa brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: It would not become attached due to the expression of good qualities.

original: nyes pa brjod kyang khong khro bar 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: nyes pa brjod kyang khong khro bar 'gyur ba med do //
translated: It would not become angry due to the expression of faults.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de bstan kyang de bzhin /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de bstan kyang de bzhin /
translated: Subhuti, it is the same with the Dharma-element of phenomena.🔽

original: ma bstan kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: ma bstan kyang de bzhin no //
translated: Subhūti, it is the same with the intrinsic nature of dharmas: it is like that whether it is taught or not.🔽”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said, “Lord,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i tshe /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i tshe /
translated: are teaching the perfection of wisdom,

original: zhum pa dang g-yeng bar mi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson par bgyid cing /
analyzed: zhum pa dang g-yeng bar mi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson par bgyid cing /
translated: they do not get discouraged or distracted, and they apply themselves to this perfection of wisdom.🔽They do not turn back from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o //
translated: That is difficult to do.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is because

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' bsgom pa ste /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams ma mchis so //

analyzed: nam mkha' la ni @330b ma rig pa ma mchis so //

analyzed: 'du byed ma mchis so //

original: rnam par shes pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ma mchis so //
translated: Consciousness does not exist.

original: ming dang gzugs ma mchis so //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs ma mchis so //

original: skye mched drug ma mchis so //
analyzed: skye mched drug ma mchis so //

original: reg pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: reg pa ma mchis so //
translated: Contact does not exist.

original: tshor ba ma mchis so //🔽sred pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: tshor ba ma mchis so // sred pa ma mchis so //
translated: Sensation does not exist.🔽Craving does not exist.

original: len pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: len pa ma mchis so //
translated: Clinging does not exist.

original: srid pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: srid pa ma mchis so //
translated: Becoming does not exist.

original: skye ba ma mchis so //
analyzed: skye ba ma mchis so //
translated: Birth does not exist.

original: rga shi ma mchis so //
analyzed: rga shi ma mchis so //
translated: Aging and death do not exist.

original: nam mkha' la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: nam mkha' la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so //
translated: In space, the perfection of generosity does not exist.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so //
translated: The perfection of discipline does not exist.🔽The perfection of patience does not exist.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so //
translated: The perfection of diligence does not exist.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so //
translated: The perfection of concentration does not exist.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so //

original: nam mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: nam mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: In space there is no emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: phyi stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: There is no emptiness of external phenomena.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so //

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so //

original: chen po stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: There is no emptiness of great extent.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: There is no emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽There is no emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so; ;'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so; ;'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: There is no emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: There is no emptiness of the unlimited.🔽There is no emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: There is no emptiness of non-dispersal.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: There is no emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: There is no emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: There is no emptiness of specific characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa @331a *//🔽nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa @331a *// nyid ma mchis so //
translated: There is no emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so //

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: the emptiness of essential nature is not found,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is not found.

original: nam mkha' la ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma mchis so //
analyzed: nam mkha' la ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma mchis so //

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams ma mchis so //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams ma mchis so //
translated: the right efforts are not found,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma mchis so //🔽dbang po rnams ma mchis so //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma mchis so // dbang po rnams ma mchis so //
translated: the legs of miraculous power are not found,🔽the faculties are not found,

original: stobs rnams ma mchis so //
analyzed: stobs rnams ma mchis so //
translated: the powers are not found,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma mchis so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma mchis so //

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis so //

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma mchis so //

original: bsam gtan rnams ma mchis so //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ma mchis so //

original: tshad med pa rnams ma mchis so //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams ma mchis so //

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma mchis so; ;rnam par thar pa brgyad ma mchis so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma mchis so; ;rnam par thar pa brgyad ma mchis so //

analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma mchis so //

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang // smon pa med pa ma mchis so //
translated: the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation are not there.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis so //

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ma mchis so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ma mchis so //

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma mchis so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma mchis so //

analyzed: nam mkha' la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma mchis so //

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma mchis so //

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma mchis so //

analyzed: byams pa chen po ma mchis @331b so; ;snying rje chen po ma mchis so //

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma mchis so //
translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not there.

analyzed: nam mkha' la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis so //
translated: In space, the fruit of entering the stream is not there.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so //

analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so //

original: dgra bcom pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid ma mchis so //

original: rang byang chub ma mchis so //
analyzed: rang byang chub ma mchis so //

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma mchis so ////

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: yongs su grol bar 'tshal ba'o //

analyzed: mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal ba'o //

analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,🔽if this trichiliocosm were

analyzed: gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di /

analyzed: smyig ma'i tshal lam /

analyzed: bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te / de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis /

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su smin par bgyi bar 'tshal zhing /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su smin par bgyi bar 'tshal zhing /

analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'ang yod /

analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'ang yod /

analyzed: dgra bcom pa'ang yod /

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /

analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang /
translated: “Blessed One, I will guard, protect, and defend the sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage who hold, maintain, recite aloud, master, and properly pay attention to this perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: bskyab pa ji lta bu zhig bgyi /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal du gsol /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal du gsol /

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Su­bhūti replied,🔽“Kauśika,

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

analyzed: gal te rigs kyi bu'am /

analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na de nyid de'i bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par 'gyur ro //
